channel.title: [PI]Hours, Seconds, Minute Variable Timer?[PI]

item.title: [PI]Hours, Seconds, Minute Variable Timer?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:5, topic:401300”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=498362.msg3644518#msg3644518 date=1309280805]
No. I’m not asking you what you think the code is. In fact, that code shouldn’t compile.

How many minutes are in an hour?
[/quote]
60 seconds in a minute
60 minutes in an hour…[/quote]

So what should you do to get the number of hours, based on the number of minutes?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Hours, Seconds, Minute Variable Timer?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:1, topic:401300”] int ratimer = ((rTimer / 2) / 60 / 60); if (ratimer <= 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("", 29173); } if (ratimer > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rare Time:@gre@ " + ratimer + " " + (ratimer < 1 ? "seconds" : "minutes")+"", 29173); }
That converts seconds into minutes.
How do I make it display hours?[/quote]

int ratimer = ((rTimer / 2) / 60 / 60); if (ratimer <= 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("", 29173); } if (ratimer > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rare Time:@gre@ " + ratimer + " " + (ratimer < 1 ? "seconds" : "minutes" : "hours")+"", 29173); }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Hours, Seconds, Minute Variable Timer?[PI]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:1, topic:401300”] int ratimer = ((rTimer / 2) / 60 / 60); if (ratimer <= 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("", 29173); } if (ratimer > 0) { getPA().sendFrame126("@lre@Rare Time:@gre@ " + ratimer + " " + (ratimer < 1 ? "seconds" : "minutes")+"", 29173); }
That converts seconds into minutes.
How do I make it display hours?[/quote]

Well, how do you convert minutes to hours (that is to say, how many minutes are in an hour)?

Read full topic

That converts seconds into minutes.
How do I make it display hours?
